text: <@U02613K0X> Here's the list of teaser sizes:  square large, square small, vertical, horizontal.

Awesome <@U02613K0X>. Thanks.
<@U02613K0X> any chance that teaser image sizes can be updated without having to re-upload them?
NM. Just found it.
<@U02618EV1>: for the teaser images i have uploaded into the cms do i need to go back & now choose an aspect ratio?
(i uploaded prior to jenny implementing this)
Nope. I can take care of that while I develop for it.
just seeing this. gaston, the teaser images have been are are still being resized the same as the images in the blocks of the case study but let me know if they need something different
No worries, <@U02613K0X>. Everything is working perfect. Thanks.
awesome
Hey <@U02613K0X>, huge request coming up:
mhm?
1. Would it be possible to clean up categories, personas and geographies so they're al lower case and spaces are replaced with dashes?
2. Is there a place/query where I can get all the active categories, personas and geographies?
1. sure
2. No but i can make one
right now they’re all hard-coded into the CMS as well, but i agree it wouldn’t be a bad idea to keep them dynamic, even if Nike doesn’t think they’ll ever change
Really?
Thanks. #2 isn't out of laziness. I just think it would be better for our node front-end server to not do those queries in real time.
<@U02618EV1>: do you have a quick second to chat video? i apologize for another discussion around this
<@U02618EV1>, for the endpoint where you are getting the categories, etc., do you want them to be lowercase and dashes instead of spaces as well?
Yes, if possible.
k
gaston take a look at <http://swapi.uncorkedstudios.com/classifications> and let me know if that’ll work for you
You're awesome <@U02613K0X>. Thanks!
no problem! i’ll fix it in the cms now so that they get saved to case studies in the new string format
